website_summaries.verdict: A set of 2 minimalist wall mounts that leave access for charging.
pros: This controller wall mount holds the PlayStation 4 DualShock controller well and also accommodates for the charging cable
The steel design is sturdy, and screws and drywall anchors are included
A minimalist design that looks sleek
cons: Though it holds the DualShock 4 well, it's not a snug fit since the Uni-C isn't specifically designed for any one controller

product_meta.description:
Size:Controller Mount| Color:BlackDESCRIPTION
HIDEit Mounts has your Video Game organization covered! With our Uni-C you can wall mount nearly any controller you can think of! Compatible with Xbox, PlayStation, Steam, Nintendo Switch, NVIDIA Shield, Wii U Gamepad, Amazon Fire TV Game controller and many more! Keep your controller safe from small hands and paws, charge your controller next to your wall mounted console, and show off your sweet special edition & modded controllers! 

Controllers sold separately 

FEATURES
Complete access to charging ports with most controllers.
Cold-rolled 16-gauge Steel for superior strength.
Black matte powder coat finish protects from rust and won’t chip.
Made in the USA from Recycled & Imported Steel. 
Quick and easy to install. No measuring, no templates. 
Includes drywall screws and anchors. Stud mounting is optional.
feature_bullets: UNIVERSAL DESIGN FITS MOST CONTROLLERS. Designed to fit a wide variety of video game controllers including Xbox, PlayStation, Steam, Nintendo, NVIDIA and more! Our Universal Controller Wall Mounts even work with most limited edition controllers!
WALL MOUNT FOR CONVENIENT ACCESS. Take advantage of unused wall space and keep your controllers organized! Mount your controller on the wall next to your game console for easy charging access.
HIDEit or DISPLAYit. Mount your favorite controller and HIDEit behind the TV for an ultra-clean setup or DISPLAYit on the wall to show off your limited edition game controller in style!

PROTECT FROM ACCIDENTS. Our HIDEit Game Controller Mount keeps your favorite controllers safe from kids, spills and other accidental damage. Powder-coat finish protects game controllers from scratches.
INSTALLit IN JUST 3 EASY STEPS. No complicated templates. Drill not required. Stud mounting optional. Includes flat head drywall screws and drywall anchors rated for 25 pounds each.
